div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode where concept is-a _DedicatedNonClinicalLocationRoleType

div.p: This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode
CodeDisplayDefinition
_DedicatedNonClinicalLocationRoleTypeDedicatedNonClinicalLocationRoleTypeA role of a place that further classifies a setting that is intended to house the provision of non-clinical services.

description.value: A role of a place that further classifies a setting that is intended to house the provision of non-clinical services.
